CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9036-IFT-43958
Project name: Nerungri Water Modernisation
Country: Russian Federation
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 43958
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: Invitation for Tenders
Issue date: 27.3.2018
Closing date: 16.5.2018 at 15:00 (local time)

This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 18.12.2013 and updated on 15.12.2017.
JSC “Nerungri City Vodokanal” hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the Bank for the Nerungri Water Modernisation Project.
The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers to provide goods for the following contract to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan:
Package #NWMP05 Supply of borehole pumps.
Tendering for contract that is to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the Bank is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers shall satisfy the following minimum criteria:

a) tenderers shall meet the eligibility requirements: no conflicts of interests, not having been declared ineligible by the Bank, compliance with requirements of tender documents for government owned entity if a tenderer is owned by the government, not having been excluded as a result of the Borrower’s country laws or by an act of compliance with UN Security Council resolution;
b) minimum average annual turnover of 10 000 000 RUB or its equivalent, calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within the last 3 (three) years;
c) a Tenderer shall have a successful experience as a Supplier for at least 3 companies operators of urban water supply over the past 5 years;
Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a nonrefundable fee of 5 000 RUB (five thousand), including VAT.
Payment of a non-refundable fee shall be made by direct bank transfer to the following account:
Currency: Russian Rubles
Beneficiary: Joint-Stock Company “Nerungri City Vodokanal”
Bank: JSC “Gazprombank” branch in the city of Vladivostok

Upon receipt of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will be promptly dispatched by courier; however, no liability can be accepted for their loss or late delivery. If requested, the documents can also be dispatched electronically after presentation by the prospective Tenderer of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee. In the event of discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.
All tenders must be accompanied by a Tender Security of 80 000 (eighty thousand) RUB or its equivalent in a convertible currency.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 16.5.2018, 5:00 local time, at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.
The applicable procurement rules are the Bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (PP and R) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
A register of potential tenderers who have purchased the tender documents may be inspected at the same address.
Prospective tenderers may obtain further information from, and also inspect and acquire the tender documents at, the following office:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , 678960, the Republic of SAKHA (Yakutia), Russian Federation, Tel./Fax:
